Motivational Wall Art – This canvas picture wall art designed with inspirational themed (printed letters Success), keep you positive every day, make people dare to pursue their dreams.
High Definition Premium Material – Inspirational Quote paintings feature clear printing, dust-proof, non-fading, UV-resistant, non-yellowing, is a very perfect decoration.
Sturdy Canvas Frame – 12*15 inch finest quality pine timber moulding for gallery quality profile. 1 inch wide wood bars and not easy to deform（but not a wood plaque）.
Ready To Hang Inspirational Wall Art – Each bedroom wall art has a metal hook already mounted on the wooden bar, ready to hung on the wall or stand on the table.
Fits Any Home Decor – This canvas wall art would be ideal for bathroom, apartment, office, living room, bedroom, or other places. A wonderful gift for your

item.title: LB3 Smart Lamp, LED Bedside Touch Lamps Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, App Go_sund Control, RGB Color Changing Dimmable & Warm White Night Light for Bedroom, USB Powered
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub requiredHands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

4
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:23 UTC – Details)



TOUCH CONTROL DIMMABLE DESK LAMP — 5000K cool white desk lamp with 3 Brightness Levels, easily adjust the brightness by touch. Cool white lighting great suit for working, studying, reading.
FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE DESIGN — This foldable LED desk lamp with 230° flexible arm and 90° base axis, good help to save desk space. Easy to place in shelves, bags, suitcases, and box.
USB POWER (AC ADAPTER INCLUDED) — You can power the desk lamp by USB Port, easy to plug into any available USB port to power the lamp, such laptop, computer, power bank. Also, you can power by the AC Adapter which includes the package.
EYE CARING TABLE LAMP — This touch table lamps are designed to be soft, stable, and non-flickering light. The office desk lamp adopts surface led light source design which could perfectly eliminate glare, visual fatigue, and improve visual effects.
PREMIUM SERVICE&LONG LIFESPAN–Our led light designed to last for more than 50000 hours, you won’t replace the LED in the next 25 years,The desk lamp led comes with 365 days worry-free service and lifetime nice customer service.Just order this touch lamp without any risk.

Price: $29.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:23 UTC – Details)

MATTER OF MINUTES: Breathe freely and sleep better as the air purifier uses 360° VortexAir Technology 3.0 and 3-stage filtration to ensure top-notch air purification
QUIET OPERATION: Sleep soundly without loud rattling coming from your air purifier. This little air purifier keeps noise levels as low as 25dB while keeping your space fresh
AROMATHERAPY: Struggling with pet odors or musty smells, Add a few drops of fragrant essential oils to the aroma pad to keep your space smelling great
SAVE SPACE: Tired of dragging a bulky purifier back and forth, Light, travel-friendly, and compact, the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier (6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 in) easily fits in any bedroom, office, or living room, creating less clutter and more fresh air

Next page

Learn More
Learn More
Learn More
Learn More


Feeling down with poor air quality?

Previous page

  1. Does your air feel stuffy?

    Small rooms can have poor air circulation, making them feel stuffy—especially when outdoor pollution is bad.

  2. Struggling to sleep?

    It’s hard to sleep soundly when airborne pollutants, such as dust and pollen, cause headaches, congestion, and coughing.

  3. Finding it hard to concentrate?

    Smoky smells, pollen from desk flowers, and airborne dust can make it difficult to focus at work.

  4. Noticing pet dander and smell?

    We love our pets, but these cute furry friends can come with pet dander and odors that lower our air quality.

Next page

Want to combat these issues but running into problems like these…

Poor Performance

Some air purifiers can run all night, but still do little to improve our air quality.

Loud & Noisy

Many conventional air purifiers operate with high noise levels, making it hard to fall asleep.

Too Big & Bulky

Lots of air purifiers are so big, it’s hard to find space for them in small rooms.

No Fragrance

Many air purifiers don’t offer the ability to add essential oils.

Finally, Meet the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

Previous page
Next page

The results? It has seriously made a world of difference!

No space is too small for this compact air purifier

Put it on your nightstand

Noticed a difference in sleep quality

Use it at the office

Put all your energy into your work

Place it on your dresser

Reduced the amount of dust on your dresser

Refresh your living room

It circulates the air well and makes it feel fresh.

“Mini” but Great

  1. We can’t always do great things, but we can do ‘mini’ things with great love.

    Whether you’re putting together your nursery, upgrading your workspace, or adding aromatherapy to your room—discover the “Great” difference one “Mini” air purifier can make.

  2. Every Mini Detail

    Every aspect of the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier is designed with thoughtful innovation, so you can create a healthy space that’s just right for you.

4.5
Price: $49.99 - $41.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:19 UTC – Details)

Customer Reviews

Best Sellers Rank #2,590 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#36 in Decorative Outdoor Lighting Projectors
Date First Available July 25, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Christmas Projector Lights

Control the movement speed of the projector light to make the lights dance, create a romantic Christmas atmosphere.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Red and Green Projector Light

Wall-mounted

【Wide Coverage】With a larger projection area and clearer picture quality, this newest upgraded Christmas light projector can cover up to 3800sf from a distance of 33ft. Anytime, anywhere, create a a cool afffect for you. The power cord of our outdoor star show light is extended to 9.84 ft, which can reach many places. Don’t worry about running out of power outdoors. Perfect for Christmas, birthday parties, festival, party, landscape and wedding decoration
【Remote Control & Timer】50ft barrier free control, easily control the movement speed of the light, change the color of the light. What’s more, this christmas lights outdoor projector has a timer function (0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h). No need to worry about power consumption, these noiseless rotating light visuals will accompany you into a warm dream
【Easy Installation】Comes with a long ground stake and round base, to insert the projection lamp into the ground or just place on the ground/table/home. Besides, it can also be mounted on th wall. Easy to move to get any areas, it only takes 1 second to create a romantic atmosphere full of stunning illumination!
【Weather Resistance】The outdoor projector light with IP65 waterproof rating, high strength, high toughness. So you do not need to worry about snow, rain, dust and strong sunlight. Rotate the projector head, to fill any place you want with romantic star light (Note: the power plug is IP44 waterproof, do not expose it water or moisture!)

Read more

Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor with Remote Control & Timer, Weather Resistance, Wide Coverage, 6 Patterns

Adjustable projection distance & Super large projection area

  • The best projection distance of this christmas projector light is 16ft-33ft.
  • The upgraded Christmas projector light has a larger projection area and clearer picture quality. Collocated with 360° adjustable projector head, construct a dreamy fairy tale world for you.

Star Shower Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor

With red and green lights blinking on the house, wall, ceiling, and lawn, our Christmas projection lights create a romantic holiday atmosphere

Package Includes

1 x Christmas Projector light

1 x Ground stake

1 x Remote

1 x AC adapter with 3m cable

1 x User instruction

Specification

  • Operating voltages:120V
  • DC adapter:5V 3W
  • Operating temperature: -25℃ to 35℃
  • Material: plastic
  • Waterproof Rank of Light: IP65
  • Waterproof Rank of Plug: IP44
  • Effective removal of the remote control: <15m
  • Scope of application: indoor & outdoor

Read more

Christmas Lights Outdoor Projector

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.

4.5
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.

4.5
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

KAILEDI Christmas Lights

To create the romantic festival atmosphere in each festival or any parties, KAILEDI snowflake string light being widely used in roads, garden hedge, trees of backyard, shop or mall windows, theater, party, stage, room, wedding ourdoor and indoor decorations and other scenes.

Christmas Decorations

The Christmas light is equipped with flexible copper wire, an be folded and bent as any postures.With cute pendants emits a warm glow, create a warm Christmas holiday atmosphere.

Christmas Lights

These snowflake lights are battery operated, no plug and extension cord need, you can put it anywhere you want to place it.

Waterproof / Outdoor Decor

This fairy string lights are waterproof , perfect for outdoor & indoor, holiday, event decoration. (Kindly note that the power adapter is not waterproof, need to place indoor).

The copper wire is flexible and bendable, which means that the string lights can be bent to any shape you want. Best choice for Christmas, birthday, party, wedding, garden and more occasions.

Product Specifications

String length: 19.6ft(=6m)Diameter of each snowflake light: 0.7 inchesEach Snowflake lights are spaced 4 inches.Light color: Warm whiteQuantity of light: 402 light modes: Steady on and flashPower source: 3 AA Battery (Without battery)

Indoor String Lights

40 Independent snowflake. Each snowflake contains an LED that emits a warm white lights, LED light and snowflake are separable.

Cute Snowflake

Christmas string lights with the soft warm white lighting adds an interesting warm white glow to your house dress-up, it will make your Christmas time lovely.

Gift for Christmas

The Christmas light decorations for home are vivid and delicate, they will be very nice and practical gifts for your friends, relatives, neighbors, classmates and more on Christmas days.

★【Innovative Design】40 independent snowflake. Each snowflake contains an LED that emits a warm white light, LED light and snowflake are separable.It will brighten up the dark corner for happiness atmosphere inside or outside.
★【Safety】the snowflakes decorations are made by high quality epoxy resin, and they have been baked in high temperature environment, which gives the snowflake high hardness. LED string light which is not overheat but safe. After hours of use, it will not get hot even if you touch it. Waterproof, energy saving, solid, environmentally friendly.
★【Waterproof Led String Lights Indoor / Outdoor】The waterproof rating of the snowflake light string is IP65, and the battery box is IP44, which allows you to use the lights both indoor and outdoor. Decorate your garden, patio, bedroom or party.
★【2-Modes】 Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs , chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Price: $152.47
(as of Nov 29,2022 09:28:37 UTC – Details)


The Skyworth premium 720P HD LED television offers perfect picture quality and sound. A TV made for the future with it’s premium LED panel and a53 quad-core Processors for both graphics and power. Durable alloy with the Gilt color and sand-blasting, the S3G Series is a TV made for the future. Skyworth was established in 1988, with the head office located within Shenzhen High Tech Industrial Park which is honored as “China’s silicon valley”, and has more than 40, 000 employees. Skyworth is a large-scale high-tech corporation mainly engaged in the development and manufacturing of consumer electronics, display devices, digital set top boxes, security monitors, network communication, semi-conductors, refrigerators, washing machines, cell phones and LED lighting etc. In 2000 Skyworth was listed on the main board of HK Stock Exchange (HK0751). After a development of more than 30 years, Skyworth has grown to be one of the Top Five Color TV brands in the world and a top brand in Chinese display industry market.
Google Assistant Built-in: No complicated button operation is needed, immediate voice identification with a one-click voice button. Watching movies, checking the weather, listening to music, and game karaoke have never been quicker.
Chromecast Built-in: Download Chromecast-enabled apps to your phone, tablet, or laptop, you can watch movies, live shows, and games from your device on our TV in this way.
Excellent Audio Technology: Built-in 2*6W independent dual-tone speakers, make the sound more shocking. Allows you to experience cinematic sound effects at home.
Multiple device input/output options: 2*HDMI, 2*USB, Ethernet, Composite In, RF In, Digital Audio Out.
What Comes with Package: Voice remote, table stand, charge cable, 2-year warranty, and 7*24 hour considerate customer service.
